benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.order: Order via app/web: Open, choose, and pay right from the browser.
benefits.faster: Faster service: Skip the counter line and track your order in real time.
benefits.menu: Always up-to-date menu: Variants, allergens, and live availability.
benefits.payments: Modern payments: Supports gateways like Twint, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and many more.

intro.built: Built and operated by Siply, a digital studio for web products and cloud infrastructure.
intro.focus: We're building a modern ordering experience that keeps the focus on hospitality while giving guests and teams the tools they need to thrive.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.body: SiplyGo makes it effortless for people to discover bars, order from their table, and enjoy their time without waiting in line. We partner closely with local venues to streamline service, reduce friction, and keep every order moving.

delight.title: Delightful guest journeys
delight.body: intuitive menus, real-time order tracking, and secure payments from any device.

empowered.title: Empowered teams
empowered.body: dashboards that help bartenders stay on top of tickets and respond to guests faster.

insight.title: Operational insight
insight.body: revenue, payout, and menu analytics that turn nightly service into actionable data.

future.title: Where we are headed
future.body: We continue to expand the platform with richer loyalty tools, flexible payouts, and integrations that help bars focus on hospitality, not hardware. New releases are rolled out frequently and shared in our Help Center so teams can adopt them with confidence.

contact.title: Stay in touch
contact.body: Questions about the roadmap or partnerships? Reach out at {email} and we will be happy to connect.

help_center.title: Help Center
help_center.intro: Find answers to the most common questions about browsing bars, placing orders, and managing your account. These guides apply to both the web app and the mobile experience.

getting_started.title: Getting started

steps.one: Create an account or log in with your existing credentials.
steps.two: Share your location or search for a city to find nearby venues.
steps.three: Select a bar, pick your table, and add items to the cart.
steps.four: Review your order, choose a payment method, and submit.

getting_started.after: After placing an order you can track the live status from the Orders page or receive updates via notifications.

account.title: Managing your account
account.profile: Update profile details, phone number, and password from the Profile page.
account.wallet: Top up credits, review transactions, and download receipts in the Wallet.
account.notifications: Check unread messages from bar staff or administrators in Notifications.

support.title: Need more help?
support.contact: Send us a note at {email}. Include the bar name, order code, and a short description so we can assist quickly.
support.hours: We respond Monday through Friday, 9:00-18:00 CET.
